column1: Image:Esse nuquerna.gifÁre Nuquerna is the name in Quenya of the thirty-second letter of the Tengwar alphabet.
column3: The names of the letters In form it is the thirty-first letter (Áre) inverted. It is mostly used as a variation
column4: especially in modes employing superimposed tehtar
column7: The additional letters and it represents Z. The Westron name for this letter is Oza.See Westron Tengwar
